amendatorysection.catchline: Wireless carrier; provide contact information; Nebraska State Patrol; duties.
amendatorysection.para: (1) Any wireless carrier authorized to do business in this state or submitting to the jurisdiction of this state shall provide updated contact information to the Nebraska State Patrol on a semiannual basis or within three working days after a change in such information that would render previous contact information invalid or inefficient for use under the Kelsey Smith Act.
(2) The Nebraska State Patrol shall collect and maintain a register of contact information for all such wireless carriers.
